name: Quality brown boots
desc: A pair of robust, quality boots. These are more suited for a colder weather and climate.

name: Green hiking boots
desc: A pair of nice green boots. These are more suited for hikes during the hotter sesons.

name: Swiss army knife
desc: This famous tool has earned its reputation of being the best for portability and for multiple use cases. It is a must have for any serious hike.

name: Simple green backpack
desc: A simple, artisinal backpack with leather deatils. This one is quite small and compact, and is probably best suited more for shorter trips.

name: Large red backpack
desc: This backpack offers a lot of room, making it suitable for longer trips. There is additionally a lot of storage on its outside for things you might be in quick need of.

name: High quality blue tent
desc: A tent is a must have for adventurers who like to sleep in the wilderness. This tent is of very high quality at an affordable price, and can fit a maximum of 4 people.
